summary: Adds a standalone follower to the game. "Alani grew up in the fridged weather that Windhelm had to offer with her parents and her younger sister. She lived in Windhelm until she turned fifteen-winters-old and tragedy struck."
descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿[url=https://flic.kr/p/22hazbJ][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4801/38907980890_93efebf635_h.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/22hazbJ][color=#a4c2f4]Alani Cover Photo[/color][/url][size=5], Flickr
[color=#a4c2f4][b]
About[/b][/color][/size]
[size=3]
Alani is the first Dragonborn I created sometime in 2013. She is a Nord two-handed Warrior.  She should level with the Dragonborn and is purely for aesthetic reasons, so she has no custom voice or actions. She uses female even tone voice and is a complete standalone follower, so you do not have to download any mods. She uses CBBE body type and Mature Skin Textures. I hope y'all enjoy and please send me pictures of her in your game![/size]


[color=#a4c2f4][size=5][b]Alani's Backstory[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]Alani grew up in the fridged weather that Windhelm had to offer with her parents and her younger sister. She lived in Windhelm until she turned fifteen-winters-old and tragedy struck. After a fight that got out of control, she was abandoned by all and banished from setting foot in Windhelm again. While obstructed by many, she had to survive in a villainous world and with her bravery and Nord-blooded stubbornness, she managed to reach her full potential and trained to perfection under a group of Mercenaries. Having finally found some stability, she works as a mercenary and hopes to find answers to the events of her past that led to her banishment from Windhelm. 

[/size][color=#a4c2f4][size=5][b]Location
[/b][/size][/color][size=3]
Alani can be found in the [b][color=#a4c2f4]Frozen Hearth[/color][/b] in [b][color=#a4c2f4]Winterhold.
[/color][/b][/size]

[color=#a4c2f4][size=5][b]Requirements
[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]Alani is standalone so the only requirement is [color=#a4c2f4][b]Skyrim[/b][/color].

[/size]
[b][color=#a4c2f4][size=5]Suggested Mods[/size][/color]
[size=3]
[/size][/b][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/]Immersive Armors[/url]﻿ by Hothtrooper44 [i]for better immersion[/i]
[/size][size=3][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019]Follower Commentary Overhaul [/url]﻿[/b]by [/size][size=3]terzaerian
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29977/?,]XCE - Warpaint and Dirt[/url]﻿ by [/size][size=3]Xenius [i]so warpaint is crisp[/i]
[/size]

[size=5][b][color=#a4c2f4]Installation [/color][/b]

[/size][size=3]Download the main file with [b]Nexus Mod Manager[/b] or [b]Mod Organizer[/b]:
Activate the mod.
Find Alani in The Frozen Hearth.[/size]

[size=3][b]If you choose to manually install the mod:
[/b][/size][size=3] 
[/size][size=3]Download the main file and extract the archive.
[/size][size=3]Paste the Data folder in your Skyrim directory.
(Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim)
[/size][size=3]Open the SkyrimLauncher.exe and press "DataFiles" and make sure "FollowerAlani.esp" is marked.[/size]
[color=#a4c2f4][b]
[size=5]Uninstallation[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][/b][/color][size=3]Uninstall the main file with Nexus [b]Mod Manager[/b] or [b]Mod Organizer.[/b]
[/size][size=3][b]If you choose to manually uninstall the mod:[/b][/size][size=3] [/size][size=3]Delete FollowerAlani.esp,

\meshes\actors\character\facegendata\facegeom\FollowerAlani.esp
\textures\actors\character\facegendata\facetint\FollowerAlani.esp
from your data folder.
[/size][color=#a4c2f4][size=5][b]
[/b][/size][/color][color=#a4c2f4][size=5][b]Tools Used[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3][b]CreationKit
NifSkope
NifMerge[/b][/size]
[color=#a4c2f4][size=5][b]
Disclaimer[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]This is my first mod ever and I am a noob when it comes to making mods for Skyrim. If there is something wrong with my mod, please let me know and be patient with me. I hope y'all enjoy my first Dragonborn and please send me pictures![/size]

[color=#a4c2f4][size=5][b]Credits[/b][/size][/color]

Maevan2 for [color=#a4c2f4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/]Mature Skin[/url]﻿[/color]
Caliente for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/]CBBE Body[/url]﻿
Kalilies and Stealthic for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]KS Hairdos Renewal[/url]﻿
Hothtrooper44 for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/]Immersive Armors[/url]﻿ (Armor used in screenshots)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10907738]Ashes2Asherz [/url]﻿for MAFKIT 2017[/center]
author: emmem123
